group_1.narration: I need to be like Tamaki-san.
Defeat Witches, help people,@become the kind of presence that everybody needs...
Yeah.
Magical Girls save everything.
Even if an incident doesn't seem to have@anything to do with Witches, it's good to help out.@And it's definitely best to help catch bad guys, too.
Tamaki-san wouldn't have ignored things like that.
But...
What if a "bad person" is still good?@What if a "good person" is still bad?
What am I supposed to do when there's@a Magical Girl who kills "bad people"?
What would Tamaki-san do?
I wonder what she'd think if she saw me like this...
She's gone now, and I've been left behind.
Me, a Magical Girl who can't do anything.@A Magical Girl who can't even make her own decisions.
Carrying on as I am@would be spitting in Tamaki-san's face...

group_1.textRight: Ah...aaah...!

group_1.textLeft: Yuu-san... Why did you do that...?

group_1.textRight: Huh? I thought I told you already, but maybe@I didn't?
It's because I'm a Magical Girl, you know?
And Magical Girls do good things, don't they?
Since this guy was on my list...
...that means he was very definitely a bad person,@alright?
So I swear I didn't make any mistakes, okay?@Pinky promise?

group_1.textLeft: You...
You at least could've listened to some of his side@of the story!

group_1.textRight: But...hearing him out would've taken a reeeaally@long time...

group_1.textLeft: John-san didn't seem that awful to me...!
He felt bad about what he did and everything!
Even though he screwed up, he could've turned@over a new leaf.
Was he not even allowed to reflect on what@he did wrong?!

group_1.textRight: B-but I don't know if it matters whether@he regretted it or wanted to make amends...
I'm not a judge...
...so I don't press charges or hand out sentences@or anyth...
Ah!
Wait, are YOU guys little judges?!

group_1.textLeft: (I don't...I don't understand this woman's@thought process at all.)

group_1.textRight: Oh... Kuroe-chan, are you okay?
Your Soul Gem's getting cloudy. It's dangerous@to leave it like that, you know?

group_1.narration: S-stop right there! Stay away from her!!
―Yuu―@I'm sorry! But she seems like she's at her limit,@so I wanted to help...
―Yuu―@I know just the person to talk to at times like this,@okay?
W-whoever you get advice from@has gotta be absolutely terrifying!
I-I-I'll protect this girl by myself...@S-so please step aside, I can handle this!
―Yuu―@Hmm...?@Oh, yeah, I just remembered!
―Yuu―@I need to give Kuroe-chan a proper thank-you@for finding that bad guy for me, too!

group_1.textLeft: *Whimper*...!
This girl...
[surround:1047A01][chara:390100:effect_7000_attack01]K-Kuroe-san... I'm gonna protect her!
[flashEffect:flashRed2][chara:104700:effect_shake]—?!

group_1.textRight: I-I-I-I'm so sorry!
Sometimes the people around me get all weird...!
But I didn't do anything, alright?
Look, I'm not even moving!
So, you know? I don't wanna be scared anymore,@so please don't attack me again, okay?
Okay? Please?

group_1.textLeft: What are you trying to do...?
Why do you kill people just because they're@"bad"...?

group_1.textRight: Because there's this person in trouble?
Um, uh... By "trouble", I mean that bad guys@keep showing up in her dreams, right?
And she gets night terrors.
Oh, because bad guys keep doing bad things@even in her dreams, of course.
It seems like she's really struggling and in a lot@of pain!
But!
I found out that every time I get rid of a bad guy,@they stop showing up in her nightmares!
So I've been going around taking out all of@the bad guys on my list...
My explanations are pretty hard to understand@after all, huh?

group_1.textLeft: (Am I just confused?)
(No, there's more to it than that...)
(Somehow, I can really sympathize with her...)

group_1.textRight: Why'd you become a Magical Girl, Kuroe-chan?

group_1.textLeft: ...For a completely insignificant wish.
I've spent my whole life as a Magical Girl@regretting it.
But then I met Tamaki-san, and she saved me.
And I wanted to change.
Even though I'm like this... I wanted to help@as many people as I can as a Magical Girl!

group_1.textRight: Ohh, I see!
Just like me, huh? I'm so happy!

group_1.textLeft: N-not at all! I'm...

group_1.textRight: Nagisa-chan told me...
...that we've lost something precious...
...and now we have to try to fill the void@that's been left behind.
That's why we're doing this Magical Girl stuff,@isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: (What should I do? What's the right thing to do?)
(What would Tamaki-san do...?)
(Please tell me, Tamaki-san...!)

group_1.textCenter: You should choose whatever answer you want.
I just... I don't even know what's right anymore...

group_1.narration: "Kuroe-chan..."
"Ku-ro-e-chan..."
